entry.title: IMG Satin - Heavy Duty Plastic Spoon Clear - 14 x 40 pcs/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: IMG Satin
Type: Disposables
Price: 22.99

IMG Satin - Heavy Duty Plastic Spoon Clear - 560 / Pack

For simple convenience, add this heavy weight plastic spoon to your take-out restaurants, cookouts, and catered events.

Easily complete your plastic cutlery set with these durable, spoons. Conveniently disposable, you won't have to waste any extra time washing large quantities of dishes. Plus, its sleek coloring is complementary to virtually any dining environment and can be dressed up or down according to the atmosphere of your event!

Heavy Weight Construction

Despite being created to throw away after use, this plastic spoon features the heavy weight design that is expected from traditional flatware. The sturdy polystyrene construction prevents it from bending, breaking, or snapping even when it is being used with heavy foods such as chicken and steak.

Rounded Edges

Thanks to its smooth, rounded edges, this spoon provides a comfortable dining experience for your customers.

Sleek Design

The handle features an intricately sleek design to add a touch of sophistication to your table setting.

entry.title: Yeseco - Mini Black PP Spoon 88MM - 250/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yeseco
Type: Disposables
Price: 5.99

Yeseco - Sample/Taster/Catering Spoon Black - 250 / Pack

Give customers a small sample of the products you have to offer with this plastic tasting spoon!

Perfect for your ice cream shop or food truck, this petite spoon allows your customers to taste some of your unique ice cream or frozen yogurt flavors so they can order several scoops that they're certain to enjoy. If you're implementing a new menu in your restaurant or bakery, use these tasting spoon to introduce some of your new dishes to your customers and increase sales.

Durable Plastic

Its durable construction provides quality, single-service use and is sturdy enough to hold samples of thick jams, sauces, and desserts.

Conveniently Disposable

Once your guests are finished, this plastic tasting spoon can easily be disposed of for fast, convenient clean up.

Our Mini Black PP Spoons are 88mm in length. They are made from virgin (no recycled PP used) PP material making it 100% recyclable. They are perfect for sampling soups, ice creams, yogurts, etc… They are widely used for restaurant business as well as sampling at the trade shows.

  • 100% RECYCLABLE
  • GREAT STRENGTH
  • ULTRA LIGHT
  • ULTRA SMOOTH SURFACE
  • 2000 PER CASE
  • GREAT ADDITION TO RESTAURANT OR SAMPLING TABLE

entry.title: Café Express - 11" Plastic Oval Plates White - 36 x 5 pcs/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Café Express
Type: Disposables
Price: 49.99

Cafe Express - 11" Plastic Oval Platter White - 36 x 5 pcs/Case

Serve your signature appetizers, lunch, dinner and desserts on an elegant dish without any of the cleanup with this plastic platter!

This plater is sure to draw attention while adding an upscale look to your wedding receptions, banquets, or other catered events.

Convenient and Disposable

This plater is designed to provide the convenience of disposability that your events require. Plus, with a versatile diameter, it's ideal for serving not only meat and potatoes, but salads, pasta, and sandwiches, too! Its lightweight design also allows for easy product separation, enabling you to quickly set tables before guests arrive.

Sophisticated Elegance

Producing sophisticated, high-quality products with the cost-efficient consumer in mind, this plater provides the perfect solution for attractive, convenient dining, and the lattice design line is no exception. Made of durable polystyrene, this plater gives you superior strength and durability without the hefty cost and risk of breakage that comes with fine china. Add some elegance to your next event with this plater!

entry.title: Café Express - 13 Oz Plastic Bowls White - 36 x 10 pcs/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Café Express
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

Cafe Express - 12 Oz Plastic Bowls White - 10 / Pack

Add an elegant touch to your event with this plastic bowl!

Inspired by ocean waves and sandy beaches, this bowl is perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and other catered events. While the rim's design lines expertly draw guests' eyes toward each dish, the rich, color provides optimum contrast against your colorful foods for an eye-catching appearance. Plus, its capacity is perfect for serving your signature sides and desserts.

Exceptional Durability

Made of durable polystyrene, this chic bowl gives you superior strength and durability without the hefty cost and risk of breakage that comes with fine china.

Round Shape

This bowl boasts a classic, round shape that lends a traditional look to table settings and is great for serving a wide variety of foods.

Lightweight Design

Its inverted, lightweight design promotes easy product separation, enabling you to quickly set tables before guests arrive.
